pages.text: Affects spells involved with summoning mobs. Affected spells have 10% reduced cooldown, your mobs last 10% longer, and affected spells cast 1 level higher than normal. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_resonance)Path of Resonance$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter has grown a connection with the souls of the worlds creatures. Imbues onto the Scepter of Summoning and persists through the Path of Resonance
